instructions.step: Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the pepper and half the onion for 3-4 minutes. Pour over the stock, cover and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the basil and blitz with a stick blender until smooth. Season to taste.
Meanwhile, brush the tuna with a little oil and griddle or fry for 3-4 minutes each side according to taste.
Toss the spinach with the remaining onion and dressing and serve with the tuna and pepper sauce.
